sentences.sentence: Information to be Minister Plenipotentiary in the end to terrorism.
sentences.translation: 资讯以全权公使要将反恐进行到底。

sentences.sentence: An ambassador extraordinary and plenipotentiary shall be the head of an embassy.
sentences.translation: 特命全权大使为大使馆的馆长。

sentences.sentence: to decide on the appointment or recall of plenipotentiary representatives abroad;
sentences.translation: 决定驻外全权代表的任免；
